items.Description: This multi-purpose silver plated bowl is the perfect return gift for events like weddings, housewarmings, baby showers, and others. This bowl can be used to hold dry fruits, baby food, sweet offerings among many other items. Item: Floral Bowl Set Contains: 1 Bowl + 1 Spoon Material: Brass Care instructions: Store it in the velvet box after use. Product may oxidize over a period of time due to chemical reactions.
